document_name: Strategi for the Third National Communication

outputs.output_descr: In coordination with relevant ministries, UNDP will support the effort of Ministry of Environment to fulfill its mandate under the President Decree Number 71 year 2011 and prepare the Third National Communication for Indonesia. This Initiation Plan will consist of designing key activities and institutional frameworks with relevant government institutions to develop the full size project document.

project_descr: Third National Communication to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
